alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 08 at 1:06PM CDT until August 12 at 8:43AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Quad Cities IA IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois... Rock River near Joslin affecting Whiteside, Henry IL and Rock Island Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO FRIDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rock River near Joslin. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Water affects residences in outlying areas immediately along the river including basements, yards, driveways, and access roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 6.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to 13.9 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon to 10.1 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
